colours.description: set to false to disable color output

cwd.description: change into <dir> before running the script

delay.description: debounce restart for a number of seconds

exec.description: execute script with "app", ie. -x "python -v".  May use variables.

execMap.description: The global config file is useful for setting up default executables

ignore.description: Ignore directory or file.  One entry per ignored value.  Wildcards are allowed.

items.description: Path or pattern of file or directory to ignore.  Can also use regular expressions wrapped in an objec eith a single property named "re".

legacyWatch.description: use polling to watch for changes (typically needed when watching over a network/Docker)

nodeArgs.description: arguments to pass to node if exec is "node"

pollingInterval.description: combined with legacyWatch, milliseconds to poll for (default 100)

quiet.description: minimise nodemon messages to start/stop only

runOnChangeOnly.description: execute script on change only, not startup

signal.description: use specified kill signal instead of default (ex. SIGTERM)

spawn.description: force nodemon to use spawn (over fork) [node only]

stdin.description: set to false to have nodemon pass stdin directly to child process

verbose.description: show detail on what is causing restarts

watch.description: Watch directory or file.  One entry per watched value.  Wildcards are allowed.

items.description: Path or pattern of file or directory to watch.  Can also use regular expressions wrapped in an objec eith a single property named "re".

anyOf.description: The filename you pass to nodemon
